virtual.bitcoin_bet: Ciao! Sono un bot di scommesse anonimo e dimostrativo di Blockchain ü§ë. Accetto scommesse sulla tariffa BTC e pago premi ai vincitori. Scopri di pi√π sul blog di ADAMANT o digita ** / help ** per iniziare a scommettere.
virtual.exchange_bot: Ciao! Sono il tuo bot di scambio ‚Çø. Opero istantaneamente e in modo anonimo. Digita ** / help ** per vedere cosa posso fare. ** ‚Ñπ ** Ô∏è Ulteriori informazioni sul blog ADAMANT.
virtual.donate_bot: Sviluppiamo ADAMANT Messenger decentralizzato grazie al tuo supporto: trasferisci ADM, BTC, ETH e altre monete in questa chat. Per ulteriori portafogli per le donazioni, vedere https://adamant.im/donate.
virtual.welcome_message:
ADAMANT is a unqiue Blockchain messenger that is independent from government, corporations and even its developers. It is possible due to a decentralized network, fully open source and users' feedback. That's why every action, including messaging or saving new contacts, has a network fee of 0.001 ADM.

Unlike typical P2P and centralized messengers, the blockchain system offers superior security and privacy. What‚Äôs more, it provides users with new possibilities such as storing and transferring cryptocurrencies In-Chat with full control of private keys; use ADAMANT as a 2FA solution, exchange cryptocurrency anonymously and bet on Bitcoin rates and more.

The ADAMANT blockchain system belongs to its users. Nobody can control, block, deactivate, restrict or censor accounts. Users take full responsibility for their content, messages, media, and goals and intentions of using the messenger.

ADAMANT is anonymous, your IP is hidden even from partners, and Tor version is available for those that want to take privacy to the next level. But remember, your security and anonymity are up to you. Do not follow links you receive, otherwise your IP can be compromised. Set a password on your device. Learn more about security and anonymity at https://adamant.im/staysecured/.

Make sure you've saved your unique passpharse for this account ‚Äî logout and login again. Write your passphrase on a sheet of paper as well. Only *you are responsible for the passphrase's safety*. It cannot be recovered. And if other person gets it, your tokens will be stolen and your correspondence will be compromised. Treat this matter with outmost importance, as if tokens in your wallet cost a billion dollars.

To Start messaging now, *get your free welcoming tokens* on Account tab. Then start a new chat and fill in your friend's ADM address. It is recommended to share your ADM address personally and via ADAMANT only.

Search Internet for ADAMANT bots' addresses. They can exchange cryptocurrencies, accept bets on crypto rates, and make wishes come true.
